methods.MethodName: Get connection intervals for a user
methods.Synopsis: Get the intervals where the user was connected to a stream

parameters.Description: Json body with the following fields: 'user_id' integer, (optional) 'definition_id' string, (optional) 'start' unix timestamp, (optional) 'end' unix timestamp

methods.Synopsis: Returns a list of currently active user IDs, with a list of connected definition IDs for each one of them

methods.MethodName: List the active users specified in the post data, within a certain time frame
methods.Synopsis: List the active users specified in the post data, within a certain time frame

parameters.Description: Json body with the following fields: 'start' unix timestamp, 'end' unix timestamp (optional, defaults to now), 'definition_id' hash of specific definition (defaults to all hashes)

methods.MethodName: DEPRECATED - Get stats about concurrent connections within a time period (month, week, day, hour)
methods.Synopsis: The granularity for 'month' and 'week' is 1 day, for 'day' is 1 hour, for 'hour' is 5 minutes.

parameters.Name: definition_id
parameters.Description: Hash of specific definition (defaults to all hashes)

methods.MethodName: Get detailed reports about all the connections within a time range

parameters.Description: Json document with the 'user_id', 'start', 'end' and 'disabled_id' properties.

methods.MethodName: Get stats about concurrent connections within a time period (month, week, day, hour).
methods.Synopsis: The granularity for 'month' and 'week' is 1 day, for 'day' is 1 hour, for 'hour' is 5 minutes.

parameters.Description: Json document with the 'user_id', 'start', 'end' and 'disabled_id' properties.

methods.MethodName: Get stats about concurrent connections within a time range
methods.Synopsis: The granularity depends on the range period, less than 2 hours it is 5 minutes, less than 2 days it is one hour and otherwise it is one day. Actual start time will be calculated from the given start time rounded down to the nearest granularity offset. Provides a rollup of how many seconds for each connection type was used within that time period.

methods.MethodName: Get stats about concurrent connections within a time range
methods.Synopsis: provides a rollup of how many seconds for each connection type was used within that time period.

methods.MethodName: Get stats about concurrent connections within a time range
methods.Synopsis: provides a rollup of how many seconds for each connection type was used within that time period.

methods.MethodName: Get the total number of seconds across all users within the time range
